title: Welcome Message
content: Welcome to our platform! Let us know if you need any assistance.

title: Password Reset
content: Your password reset request has been successfully processed. Click the link to set a new password.

title: Subscription Confirmation
content: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. Stay tuned for updates!

title: Order Confirmation
content: Your order #12345 has been confirmed. You will receive a shipping notification soon.

title: Appointment Reminder
content: This is a reminder for your appointment scheduled on 2024-12-04 at 11:00 AM.

title: Feedback Request
content: We value your feedback! Please take a moment to rate your recent experience with us.

title: Promotional Offer
content: Exclusive deal! Get 20% off on your next purchase. Offer valid till 2024-12-10.

title: Security Alert
content: We noticed a login attempt from a new device. If this was not you, please secure your account immediately.

title: Event Invitation
content: You're invited to our Annual Gala on 2024-12-15. RSVP by 2024-12-10.

title: Payment Receipt
content: Your payment of $150 has been successfully processed. Thank you for your purchase!
